verses.roman:
yadyapi brahmāṇḍa-gaṇera puruṣa āśraya
sei puruṣādi sabhāra kṛṣṇa mūlāśraya

synonyms: yadyapi—although; brahma-aṇḍa-gaṇera—of the multitude of universes; puruṣa—the puruṣa-avatāra; āśraya—the shelter; sei—that; puruṣa-ādi—of the puruṣa-avatāras, etc.; sabhāra—of the assembly; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; mūla-āśraya—original source.
translation: "Although the three puruṣas are the shelter of all the universes, Lord Kṛṣṇa is the original source of the puruṣas.
